name: AIR WAR - Cross or Die
description:
Compiled basic version (Boriel) of the mythical game ported to the most important 8-bit systems: HARRIER ATTACK

You will be at the controls of a Harrier on a scouting mission avoiding enemies until you reach the aircraft carrier.

Dodge the anti-aircraft and helicopters over the sea, the mountains and the city to deliver the results of your exploration to the high command.

Sorry if it does not reach the minimum quality or playability. It was an exercise in Basic where I had a lot of fun programming with the help of my partner Siyei Er

Fito :-)
